sec.div: Residents’ perceptions of their programs’ feedback culture (FEEDME-Culture survey)
sec.p: The Mann-Whitney U tests results denoted that there were no significant differences on the FEEDME-Culture mean score between the Internal Medicine and Pediatrics residency programs (p > 0.05) from different institutions (i.e., MMC vs. BIA internal residents, and MMC vs. BIB pediatric residents).
